item.description:
Shamballa Levels 3 & 4

Please note, this class is for those who have already attended the Level 1 & Level 2 Classes on
November 29th.

These classes will be taking the student to the Master Level, to learn how to attune to all levels
and teach classes, as well of DNA activation, channeling activation and Myo fascial release training.

Class will be $50.00 for Level 3 Attunement/ Class from 1:00- 3:30
and $50.00 for Level 4 Attunement Class from 4:00- 5:30
(cash, check, paypal accepted)

Grounding snacks, Level 3 & 4 paperwork and Master certificates will be provided.

Snow date will be Sunday, Jan 31st- Please watch your email for cancellations......
item.name: Shamballa Levels 3 & 4
